name: echoes-of-future

scripts.setup: npm i && npm --prefix ./frontend i --force && npm --prefix ./backend i
scripts.dev: concurrently -n front,back -c green,yellow -t "HH:mm:ss" -p "{name} {time}" "npm --prefix ./frontend run start" "npm --prefix ./backend run dev"
scripts.lint: npm --prefix ./frontend run lint && npm --prefix ./backend run lint
scripts.fix: npm --prefix ./frontend run fix && npm --prefix ./backend run fix

author: Madeline Thomas, Morgan Mezaache, Jonathan Caillon, Carl Marion, Marion Lalonde
